verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass, <WG1096> that, as he <WG846> was <WG1511> praying <WG4336> in <WG1722> a certain <WG5100> place, <WG5117> when <WG5613> he ceased, <WG3973> one <WG5100> of his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> Lord, <WG2962> teach <WG1321> us <WG2248> to pray, <WG4336> as <WG2531> John <WG2491> also <WG2532> taught <WG1321> his <WG848> disciples. <WG3101>

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> When <WG3752> ye pray, <WG4336> say, <WG3004> Our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> art in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> Hallowed <WG37> be thy <WG4675> name. <WG3686> Thy <WG4675> kingdom <WG932> come. <WG2064> Thy <WG4675> will <WG2307> be done, <WG1096> as <WG5613> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> so <WG2532> in <WG1909> earth. <WG1093>
Give <WG1325> us <WG2254> day by day <WG2596> <WG2250> our <WG2257> daily <WG1967> bread. <WG740>

And <WG2532> forgive <WG863> us <WG2254> our <WG2257> sins; <WG266> for <WG1063> we <WG846> also <WG2532> forgive <WG863> every one <WG3956> that is indebted <WG3784> to us. <WG2254> And <WG2532> lead <WG1533> us <WG2248> not <WG3361> into <WG1519> temptation; <WG3986> but <WG235> deliver <WG4506> us <WG2248> from <WG575> evil. <WG4190>

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> Which <WG5101> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> shall have <WG2192> a friend, <WG5384> and <WG2532> shall go <WG4198> unto <WG4314> him <WG846> at midnight, <WG3317> and <WG2532> say <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Friend, <WG5384> lend <WG5531> me <WG3427> three <WG5140> loaves; <WG740>

For <WG1894> a friend <WG5384> of mine <WG3450> in <WG1537> his journey <WG3598> is come <WG3854> to <WG4314> me, <WG3165> and <WG2532> I have <WG2192> nothing <WG3756> to <WG3739> set before <WG3908> him? <WG846>

And he <WG2548> from within <WG2081> shall answer <WG611> and say, <WG2036> Trouble me not: <WG3930> <WG3427> <WG3361> <WG2873> the <WG3588> door <WG2374> is now <WG2235> shut, <WG2808> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> children <WG3813> are <WG1526> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> in <WG1519> bed; <WG2845> I cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> rise <WG450> and give <WG1325> thee. <WG4671>

I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> Though <WG1499> he will not <WG3756> rise <WG450> and give <WG1325> him, <WG846> because he is <WG1511> his <WG846> friend, <WG5384> yet <WG1065> because <WG1223> of his <WG846> importunity <WG335> he will rise <WG1453> and give <WG1325> him <WG846> as many as <WG3745> he needeth. <WG5535>

And I <WG2504> say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> Ask, <WG154> and <WG2532> it shall be given <WG1325> you; <WG5213> seek, <WG2212> and <WG2532> ye shall find; <WG2147> knock, <WG2925> and <WG2532> it shall be opened <WG455> unto you. <WG5213>
For <WG1063> every one <WG3956> that asketh <WG154> receiveth; <WG2983> and <WG2532> he that seeketh <WG2212> findeth; <WG2147> and <WG2532> to him that knocketh <WG2925> it shall be opened. <WG455>

If <WG1161> a son <WG5207> shall ask <WG154> bread <WG740> of any <WG5101> of you <WG5216> that is a father, <WG3962> will he <WG3361> give <WG1929> him <WG846> a stone? <WG3037> or <WG2532> if <WG1487> he ask a fish, <WG2486> will <WG3361> he for <WG473> a fish <WG2486> give <WG1929> him <WG846> a serpent? <WG3789>
Or <WG2228> <WG2532> if <WG1437> he shall ask <WG154> an egg, <WG5609> will he <WG3361> offer <WG1929> him <WG846> a scorpion? <WG4651>

If <WG1487> ye <WG5210> then, <WG3767> being <WG5225> evil, <WG4190> know <WG1492> how to give <WG1325> good <WG18> gifts <WG1390> unto your <WG5216> children: <WG5043> how much <WG4214> more <WG3123> shall your heavenly <WG1537> <WG3772> Father <WG3962> give <WG1325> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> to them that ask <WG154> him? <WG846>

And <WG2532> he was <WG2258> casting out <WG1544> a devil, <WG1140> and <WG2532> it <WG846> was <WG2258> dumb. <WG2974> And <WG1161> it came to pass, <WG1096> when the <WG3588> devil <WG1140> was gone out, <WG1831> the <WG3588> dumb <WG2974> spake; <WG2980> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> people <WG3793> wondered. <WG2296>
But <WG1161> some <WG5100> of <WG1537> them <WG846> said, <WG2036> He casteth out <WG1544> devils <WG1140> through <WG1722> Beelzebub <WG954> the chief <WG758> of the <WG3588> devils. <WG1140>
And <WG1161> others, <WG2087> tempting <WG3985> him, sought <WG2212> of <WG3844> him <WG846> a sign <WG4592> from <WG1537> heaven. <WG3772>

But <WG1161> he, <WG846> knowing <WG1492> their <WG846> thoughts, <WG1270> said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> Every <WG3956> kingdom <WG932> divided <WG1266> against <WG1909> itself <WG1438> is brought to desolation; <WG2049> and <WG2532> a house <WG3624> divided against <WG1909> a house <WG3624> falleth. <WG4098>

<WG1161> If <WG1487> Satan <WG4567> also <WG2532> be divided <WG1266> against <WG1909> himself, <WG1438> how <WG4459> shall his <WG846> kingdom <WG932> stand? <WG2476> because <WG3754> ye say <WG3004> that I <WG3165> cast out <WG1544> devils <WG1140> through <WG1722> Beelzebub. <WG954>

And <WG1161> if <WG1487> I <WG1473> by <WG1722> Beelzebub <WG954> cast out <WG1544> devils, <WG1140> by <WG1722> whom <WG5101> do your <WG5216> sons <WG5207> cast them out? <WG1544> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> shall they <WG846> be <WG2071> your <WG5216> judges. <WG2923>

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> I with <WG1722> the finger <WG1147> of God <WG2316> cast out <WG1544> devils, <WG1140> no doubt <WG686> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is come <WG5348> upon <WG1909> you. <WG5209>
When <WG3752> a strong man <WG2478> armed <WG2528> keepeth <WG5442> his <WG1438> palace, <WG833> his <WG846> goods <WG5224> are <WG2076> in <WG1722> peace: <WG1515>

But <WG1161> when <WG1875> a stronger <WG2478> than he <WG846> shall come upon <WG1904> him, and overcome <WG3528> him, <WG846> he taketh <WG142> from him all his armor <WG3833> <WG846> wherein <WG1909> <WG3739> he trusted, <WG3982> and <WG2532> divideth <WG1239> his <WG846> spoils. <WG4661>

He that is <WG5607> not <WG3361> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> is <WG2076> against <WG2596> me: <WG1700> and <WG2532> he that gathereth <WG4863> not <WG3361> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> scattereth. <WG4650>

When <WG3752> the <WG3588> unclean <WG169> spirit <WG4151> is gone <WG1831> out of <WG575> a man, <WG444> he walketh <WG1330> through <WG1223> dry <WG504> places, <WG5117> seeking <WG2212> rest; <WG372> and <WG2532> finding <WG2147> none, <WG3361> he saith, <WG3004> I will return <WG5290> unto <WG1519> my <WG3450> house <WG3624> whence <WG3606> I came out. <WG1831>
And <WG2532> when he cometh, <WG2064> he findeth <WG2147> it swept <WG4563> and <WG2532> garnished. <WG2885>

Then <WG5119> goeth <WG4198> he, and <WG2532> taketh <WG3880> to him seven <WG2033> other <WG2087> spirits <WG4151> more wicked <WG4191> than himself; <WG1438> and <WG2532> they enter in, <WG1525> and <WG2532> dwell <WG2730> there: <WG1563> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> last <WG2078> state of that <WG1565> man <WG444> is <WG1096> worse <WG5501> than the <WG3588> first. <WG4413>

And <WG1161> it came to pass, <WG1096> as he <WG846> spake <WG3004> these things, <WG5023> a certain <WG5100> woman <WG1135> of <WG1537> the <WG3588> company <WG3793> lifted up <WG1869> her voice, <WG5456> and said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Blessed <WG3107> is the <WG3588> womb <WG2836> that bare <WG941> thee, <WG4571> and <WG2532> the paps <WG3149> which <WG3739> thou hast sucked. <WG2337>
But <WG1161> he <WG846> said, <WG2036> Yea rather, <WG3304> blessed <WG3107> are they that hear <WG191> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> keep <WG5442> it. <WG846>

And <WG1161> when the <WG3588> people <WG3793> were gathered thick together, <WG1865> he began <WG756> to say, <WG3004> This <WG3778> is <WG2076> an evil <WG4190> generation: <WG1074> they seek <WG1934> a sign; <WG4592> and <WG2532> there shall no <WG3756> sign <WG4592> be given <WG1325> it, <WG846> but <WG1508> the <WG3588> sign <WG4592> of Jonah <WG2495> the <WG3588> prophet. <WG4396>

For <WG1063> as <WG2531> Jonah <WG2495> was <WG1096> a sign <WG4592> unto the <WG444> Ninevites, <WG3536> so <WG3779> shall also <WG2532> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be <WG2071> to this <WG5026> generation. <WG1074>

The queen <WG938> of the south <WG3558> shall rise up <WG1453> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> judgment <WG2920> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> men <WG435> of this <WG5026> generation, <WG1074> and <WG2532> condemn <WG2632> them: <WG846> for <WG3754> she came <WG2064> from <WG1537> the <WG3588> utmost parts <WG4009> of the <WG3588> earth <WG1093> to hear <WG191> the <WG3588> wisdom <WG4678> of Solomon; <WG4672> and, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> a greater <WG4119> than Solomon <WG4672> is here. <WG5602>

The men <WG435> of Nineveh <WG3535> shall rise up <WG450> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> judgment <WG2920> with <WG3326> this <WG5026> generation, <WG1074> and <WG2532> shall condemn <WG2632> it: <WG846> for <WG3754> they repented <WG3340> at <WG1519> the <WG3588> preaching <WG2782> of Jonah; <WG2495> and, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> a greater <WG4119> than Jonah <WG2495> is here. <WG5602>

No man, <WG3762> when he hath lighted <WG681> a candle, <WG3088> putteth <WG5087> it in <WG1519> a secret place, <WG2927> neither <WG3761> under <WG5259> a bushel, <WG3426> but <WG235> on <WG1909> a candlestick, <WG3087> that <WG2443> they which come in <WG1531> may see <WG991> the <WG3588> light. <WG5338>

The <WG3588> light <WG3088> of the <WG3588> body <WG4983> is <WG2076> the <WG3588> eye: <WG3788> therefore <WG3767> when <WG3752> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> is <WG5600> single, <WG573> thy <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> also <WG2532> is <WG2076> full of light; <WG5460> but <WG1161> when <WG1875> thine eye is <WG5600> evil, <WG4190> thy <WG4675> body <WG4983> also <WG2532> is full of darkness. <WG4652>
Take heed <WG4648> therefore <WG3767> that the <WG3588> light <WG5457> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> be <WG2076> not <WG3361> darkness. <WG4655>

If <WG1487> thy <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> therefore <WG3767> be full of light, <WG5460> having <WG2192> no <WG3361> <WG5100> part <WG3313> dark, <WG4652> the whole <WG3650> shall be <WG2071> full of light, <WG5460> as <WG5613> when <WG3752> the <WG3588> bright shining <WG796> of a candle <WG3088> doth give thee light. <WG5461> <WG4571>

And <WG1161> as he spake, <WG2980> a certain <WG5100> Pharisee <WG5330> besought <WG2065> him <WG846> to <WG3704> dine <WG709> with <WG3844> him: <WG846> and <WG1161> he went <WG1525> in, and sat down to meat. <WG377>
And <WG1161> when the <WG3588> Pharisee <WG5330> saw <WG1492> it, he marveled <WG2296> that <WG3754> he had not <WG3756> first <WG4412> washed <WG907> before <WG4253> dinner. <WG712>

And <WG1161> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> Now <WG3568> do ye <WG5210> Pharisees <WG5330> make clean <WG2511> the <WG3588> outside <WG1855> of the <WG3588> cup <WG4221> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> platter; <WG4094> but <WG1161> your <WG5216> inward part <WG2081> is full <WG1073> of ravening <WG724> and <WG2532> wickedness. <WG4189>
Ye fools, <WG878> did not <WG3756> he that made <WG4160> that <WG3588> which is without <WG1855> make <WG4160> that <WG3588> which is within <WG2081> also? <WG2532>
But <WG4133> rather give <WG1325> alms <WG1654> of such things as ye have; <WG1751> and, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> all things <WG3956> are <WG2076> clean <WG2513> unto you. <WG5213>

But <WG235> woe <WG3759> unto you, <WG5213> Pharisees! <WG5330> for <WG3754> ye tithe <WG586> mint <WG2238> and <WG2532> rue <WG4076> and <WG2532> all manner <WG3956> of herbs, <WG3001> and <WG2532> pass over <WG3928> judgment <WG2920> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> love <WG26> of God: <WG2316> these <WG5023> ought <WG1163> ye to have done, <WG4160> and not to leave the other undone. <WG2548> <WG3361> <WG863>

Woe <WG3759> unto you, <WG5213> Pharisees! <WG5330> for <WG3754> ye love <WG25> the <WG3588> uppermost seats <WG4410> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> synagogues, <WG4864> and <WG2532> greetings <WG783> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> markets. <WG58>

Woe <WG3759> unto you, <WG5213> scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> Pharisees, <WG5330> hypocrites! <WG5273> for <WG3754> ye are <WG2075> as <WG5613> graves <WG3419> which appear not, <WG82> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> men <WG444> that walk <WG4043> over <WG1883> them are not aware <WG1492> <WG3756> of them.

Then <WG1161> answered <WG611> one <WG5100> of the <WG3588> lawyers, <WG3544> and said <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Master, <WG1320> thus <WG5023> saying <WG3004> thou reproachest <WG5195> us <WG2248> also. <WG2532>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said, <WG2036> Woe <WG3759> unto you <WG5213> also, <WG2532> ye lawyers! <WG3544> for <WG3754> ye lade <WG5412> men <WG444> with burdens <WG5413> grievous to be borne, <WG1419> and <WG2532> ye yourselves <WG846> touch <WG4379> not <WG3756> the <WG3588> burdens <WG5413> with one <WG1520> of your <WG5216> fingers. <WG1147>

Woe <WG3759> unto you! <WG5213> for <WG3754> ye build <WG3618> the <WG3588> sepulchers <WG3419> of the <WG3588> prophets, <WG4396> and <WG1161> your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> killed <WG615> them. <WG846>

Truly <WG686> ye bear witness <WG3140> that <WG2532> ye allow <WG4909> the <WG3588> deeds <WG2041> of your <WG5216> fathers: <WG3962> for <WG3754> they <WG846> indeed <WG3303> killed <WG615> them, <WG846> and <WG1161> ye <WG5210> build <WG3618> their <WG846> sepulchers. <WG3419>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> also <WG2532> said <WG2036> the <WG3588> wisdom <WG4678> of God, <WG2316> I will send <WG649> <WG1519> them <WG846> prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> apostles, <WG652> and <WG2532> some of <WG1537> them <WG846> they shall slay <WG615> and <WG2532> persecute: <WG1559>

That <WG2443> the <WG3588> blood <WG129> of all <WG3956> the <WG3588> prophets, <WG4396> which was shed <WG1632> from <WG575> the foundation <WG2602> of the world, <WG2889> may be required <WG1567> of <WG575> this <WG5026> generation; <WG1074>

From <WG575> the <WG3588> blood <WG129> of Abel <WG6> unto <WG2193> the <WG3588> blood <WG129> of Zacharias, <WG2197> which perished <WG622> between <WG3342> the <WG3588> altar <WG2379> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> temple: <WG3624> verily <WG3483> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> It shall be required <WG1567> of <WG575> this <WG5026> generation. <WG1074>

Woe <WG3759> unto you, <WG5213> lawyers! <WG3544> for <WG3754> ye have taken away <WG142> the <WG3588> key <WG2807> of knowledge: <WG1108> ye entered not in <WG1525> <WG3756> yourselves, <WG846> and <WG2532> them that were entering in <WG1525> ye hindered. <WG2967>

And <WG1161> as he <WG846> said <WG3004> these things <WG5023> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> the <WG3588> scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> began <WG756> to urge <WG1758> him vehemently, <WG1171> and <WG2532> to provoke him to speak <WG653> <WG846> of <WG4012> many things: <WG4119>

Laying wait <WG1748> for him, <WG846> and <WG2532> seeking <WG2212> to catch <WG2340> something <WG5100> out of <WG1537> his <WG846> mouth, <WG4750> that <WG2443> they might accuse <WG2723> him. <WG846>
